price: 147 Ceci est bien la vérité émanant de ton Seigneur. Ne sois donc pas de ceux qui en doutent.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
